data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 199 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Latgale.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Latgale, Latvia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Latgale, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Latgale you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Latgale.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people is yours.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Latgale.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Latgale.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the state of Latgale, Latvia has a population of 2,700.

We estimate Latgale has 199 people who might know Jesus, 1,425 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,076 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 199 believers in Latgale that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
